mapper.select: SELECT WARE_NO /* 창고번호 */ , WARE_NM /* 창고명 */ , TO_NUMBER(SORT_DV_VAL) AS SORT_DV_VAL /* 정렬구분값 */ FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ /* 월별창고내역 */ WHERE APY_YM = #{baseYm} AND WARE_DV_CD = '2' /* 서비스센터 */ AND WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '20' /* 조직창고 */ AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' AND ( WARE_NM LIKE '%센터' OR WARE_NM LIKE '%지점' OR WARE_NM LIKE '%기장' OR WARE_NM LIKE '%창고' ) UNION ALL SELECT '000001' AS WARE_NO , #{allText} AS WARE_NM , 0 AS SORT_DV_VAL FROM DUAL ORDER BY SORT_DV_VAL, WARE_NM, WARE_NO

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T1 /* 상품기본 */ INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 /* 상품각사속성상세 */ ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD WHERE T1.PD_TP_CD = 'M' AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL19 = '6' /* A/S자재 */
AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL21 = '01'
AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL15 = 'Y'
AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL30 = 'Y'
AND ( T2.PD_PRP_VAL32 IS NULL OR T2.PD_PRP_VAL32 = 'Y' )
AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL32 <> 'Y'

SELECT D1.MGT_TYP_NM /* 유형 */ , D1.SAP_CD /* SAP코드 */ , D1.ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , D1.ITM_PD_NM /* 상품명 */ , D1.COMM_GB /* 중수리자재 */ , D1.BASE_GB /* 기초자재 */ , ${wareNoFields} /* PIVOT 필드 */ FROM ( SELECT T1.PD_CD AS ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , T1.PD_ABBR_NM AS ITM_PD_NM /* 품목상품명 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(T1.SAP_MAT_CD)) AS SAP_CD /* SAP코드 */ , NVL(T2.PD_PRP_VAL15, 'N') AS BASE_GB /* 상시보유자재 */ , NVL(T2.PD_PRP_VAL21, 'N') AS COMM_GB /* 공통부품구분 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'MAT_MNGT_DV_CD', T2.PD_PRP_VAL02, #{session.langId}) AS MGT_TYP_NM /* 유형 */ FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T1 /* 상품기본 */ INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 /* 상품각사속성상세 */ ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD WHERE T1.PD_TP_CD = 'M' AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL19 = '6' /* A/S자재 */
AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL21 = '01'
AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL15 = 'Y'
AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL30 = 'Y'
AND ( T2.PD_PRP_VAL32 IS NULL OR T2.PD_PRP_VAL32 = 'Y' )
AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL32 <> 'Y'
) D1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , WARE_NO /* 창고번호 */ , ITM_MNGT_GD_CD /* 품목관리등급코드 */ FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_GD_IZ /* 고객서비스품목등급내역 */ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND MNGT_YM = #{baseYm} ) T1 PIVOT ( MAX(ITM_MNGT_GD_CD) FOR WARE_NO IN (${wareNoInStr}) ) ) D2 ON D2.ITM_PD_CD = D1.ITM_PD_CD ORDER BY D1.SAP_CD, D1.ITM_PD_CD
OFFSET ${offSet} ROW FETCH NEXT ${size} ROW ONLY
